room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Extraordinary Escape Rooms in West Palm Beach
review: We were advised The Jewel Heist would be a challenge for just the 3 of us. All of us had experience in escape games so we decided to go for it. We escaped with 2 minutes to spare!! The room was definitely a challenge but the clues were presented in a logical way so that we never felt hopeless. Awesome room!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Extraordinary Escape Rooms in West Palm Beach
review: Our group of four did the "Jewel Heist" escape room last evening. It was amazing to see how we needed each other to work through the puzzles! The owner has created such a neat experience for anyone who walks through the door! If you are "puzzled" about the concept, just give it a try!!! üòÅ
